name: Mary Pickford
description: Mary Pickford herself. [Photograph: wikipedia.org] Among the drinks that Gourmet selected from its archives to highlight the magazine's almost 70 years in print (now sadly cut short), one has a name as well as a character that spins the...

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
